Voila !!


  Welcome to my website! I'm Harikrishnan (Hari) - Master's student in Data Science. I have 4+ years of experience in Data Science, Machine Learning, NLP and Computer Vision.

  I am passionate about using Data Science and Artificial Intelligence to build products and strive to stay current on the latest trends and technologies in the industry ( LLMs are stunning yet concerning! ). You can see a few of my projects and interests here.


  Thanks for visiting! I will be glad if we can connect :)
